title: Motor Trend Front Windshield Shade with Static Cling Side Window Shade-Jumbo Accordion Folding Auto Sunshade for Car Truck SUV-Blocks UV Rays Sun Visor Protector-Keeps Your Vehicle Cool-66 x 27 Inch
features: TOP QUALITY FITMENT - Size: 66" Width x 27" Height. Universally made for most personal vehicles and fits the windshield using the rear-view mirror as support. The tapered edges allow for a more snug fit.

COMFORTABLE COOL INTERIOR - On a typical sunny day, avoid the extra heat and keep your interior cool with our top quality Windshield Sunshade Protector. Reduces interior car temperatures by 30-50 degrees. Blocks damaging UV rays; Keeps car cooler on sunny days

GREAT FOR CAR VAN TRUCK SUV - Increases the lifespan of your vehicle's dash surface, radio, LCD Screen, GPS Devices and other electronics. Unique design with a lightweight, reinforced frame simplifies application and re-positioning
100% UV PROTECTION - Dual-Layer Bubble design for maximum protection for your vehicle's interior, keeping your seats and steering wheel cool by blocking the sun's heat and harmful UV radiation rays.

QUICK AND EASY SETUP / REVERSIBLE- The foldable accordion design allows you to prop the sunshade up with ease and fold-away storage with a velcro closure. It can also be reversed and used on both sides with the same protection!
description: Double Bubble premium construction with reflective backing auto shade is a great way to protect your vehicle from the scorching heat or simply to protect your vehicle from the constant UV rays. Featuring dual usage (front and back). provides privacy in your vehicle. Our shades are constructed with your vehicle in mind. Fits most sedans, trucks and vans. The fan fold construction and the side Velcro allows the shades to be easily stored when not in use. Car Windshield Sun Shade - Blocks UV Rays Sun Visor Protector, Sunshade to Keep Your Vehicle Cool and Damage Free, Easy to Use, Fits Windshields of Various SizesKeep your car interior cool while also adding a stylish look. Tapered edges are great for a more snug fit to your windshield. Deep cutout also allows for rear view mirror fit. The high quality insulated bubble foil protects and cools your car's interior. This car sunshade features a dual-layer reflective design that is reversible and can conveniently be used on either side. The sun shade will protect your cars interior from harmful UV rays, which can cause your car to discolor and deteriorate. PremiumWindshield Auto Sun Shade FeaturesProtects vehicle interior from major sun damageKeep your interior cooler by reducing temperature by about 30 to 50 degrees. Protects LCD screens, GPS devices, and other electronicsEliminates dashboard fading and crack formationCompact accordion folding design allow for easy storage in glove compartment or door pocketEasily pops open and installs in seconds, safe, and convenient to use!
